alert.note: Alert for Benewah; Shoshone (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 15 at 10:06AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall due to thunderstorms is possible. * WHERE...A portion of North Idaho, including the following counties, Benewah and Shoshone. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 9 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rain potential from thunderstorms is forecast to track in the watch area. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood https://www.weather.gov/spokane
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
